jd: From: Piyush Kumar, Siriinfo piyush.kumar@siriinfo.com Reply to: piyush.kumar@siriinfo.com Role- Program Manager-Retail (Manhattan WMS)Location- Dublin, CA (Hybrid) Responsibilities* Provide an oversight to WMS modernization program Provide recommendations for the governance of this program Provide the industry best practices for successful implementation of the Planning and Architecture Design Phase – 1 Partner with Ross Project Leads to execute this program Participate in coordination between Business and technical project teams.* Ensure the creation and review of all relevant documentation and Deliverables.* Facilitate timely governance meetings and project updates.* Monitor and evaluate project progress and status reporting.* Manage escalations and issues that may arise.* Responsible for weekly status, Program Advisory and Steering Committee presentations.
